title: Close to Manhattan and Excellent Staff!
text:
My family stayed at this location in late February for 3 nights while on an Northeast College Tour. Honestly, we had a little trouble getting the hotel due to "crazy levels of traffic" which certainly was not the hotles fault but worth mentioning as driving in NYC is a wild adventure. Once we pulled in and checked in, we experienced nothing but friendly and helpful staff. The hotel is close to subway stations and restaurants.
The breakfast each morning was fresh and delicious. The staff was helpful and keep the food flowing out. We especially liked the "make your own" waffles. The coffee was also very good (Seattle's Best" which was nice on cold mornings.
The rooms were a nice size but typically NYC small. The elavators were quick which we also liked. The bathrooms were clean and plenty of shampoo, towles, etc.
We have stayed in NYC hotles many times on Manhattan and the next time we plan a NYC visit, we will definately come back here as you cannot beat the price and service. Also the Bellman was super helpful, friendly and infoirmative.
Check out was super easy and the valet was also quick with the car service. We loved our 3 days here.
